ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // {Cloud}
“What is it? You're givin' me the willies.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // {Cloud}
“Who cares if you're impressed?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:10}); // {Barret}
“Just stop it, {Cloud}!
I don't care where!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:4}); // {Barret}
“So there are times when even you
fight for other people.
I am impressed.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:6}); // {Barret}
“Y'know, I ain't so good at sayin' this but…
Sorry…for…lots of things.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:10}); // {Barret}
“Just stop it, {Cloud}!
I don't care where!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // {Cloud}
“I didn't want to start a ruckus till
we saved {Aeris}.”{PAUSE}“I should have known
that was impossible though…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // “No, uh, that's all right.
My mistake.
I'm, uh, not getting on.”
fade({r:255, g:150, b:150, speed:32, type:2, adjust:0});
fade({r:255, g:150, b:150, speed:32, type:1, adjust:255});

dialogStrings:
{Cloud}
“I didn't want to start a ruckus till
we saved {Aeris}.”{PAUSE}“I should have known
that was impossible though…”

{Cloud}
“What is it? You're givin' me the willies.”

{Barret}
“So there are times when even you
fight for other people.
I am impressed.”

{Barret}
“Y'know, I ain't so good at sayin' this but…
Sorry…for…lots of things.”

{Barret}
“Just stop it, {Cloud}!
I don't care where!”

“No, uh, that's all right.
My mistake.
I'm, uh, not getting on.”
